label: Metz, Mark A., Shaun L. Winterton & Michael E. Irwin.  2002. Notes on the functional morphology of terminalia from Prorates ballmeri Nagatomi and Liu (Diptera: Scenopinidae: Proratinae) collected while in copula, with a description of the previously unknown female. Zootaxa 76: 1-12.
